author: Mike
summary: Established comprehensive naming conventions across all AI systems
details: Created official NAMING_CONVENTIONS.md establishing PascalCase for projects (OfflineAI, ResilientTomorrow, NeighborhoodShare) and snake_case for tags (offline_ai, resilient_tomorrow, neighborhood_share). This ensures consistency between Claude, ChatGPT, and OpenWebUI for all future content creation.

author: Mike
details: Comprehensive guide explaining how to add, update, and archive projects in the knowledge management system. Includes checklists, examples, and best practices for maintaining the project registry across all AI systems.

author: Mike
summary: Created SETUP_GUIDE.md for new AI instances
details: Developed comprehensive setup guide for configuring new AI systems (Claude, ChatGPT, OpenWebUI) to work with RT-Assistant. Includes quick start, detailed configuration by AI type, session workflows, and validation checklists.

author: Mike
details: Quick reference guide for ChatGPT showing exactly how to format memory entries with correct naming conventions, timestamps, and required fields. Includes validation checklist and common mistakes to avoid.

author: Mike
summary: Reorganized AI session files into _system/ai_sessions structure
details: Moved Claude and ChatGPT session files from root knowledge folders into organized _system/ai_sessions/ structure with separate folders for each AI system. Created README explaining purpose and organization of archived session files.

author: Mike
summary: Archived legacy memory files to memory/archive folder
details: Moved all backup and legacy memory files (memory.jsonl.bak, .old, .pre-normalization-backup, .rejects) to dedicated archive folder to clean up working directory while preserving history.

author: Mike

details: Created main README.md at rt-assistant root and knowledge/README.md providing complete system overview, directory structure, quick start guides, naming conventions reference, and links to all documentation. Both serve as entry points for humans and AI systems.

author: Mike
summary: MAJOR MILESTONE: Completed comprehensive system standardization v2.0
details: Successfully standardized entire RT-Assistant knowledge management system with: official naming conventions (PascalCase projects, snake_case tags), complete documentation suite (7 new docs), reorganized file structure, archived legacy files, created cross-AI integration guides, and established clear standards for all future work.
